column1: 719158963435981660^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/common-questions?lang=eng^Common Questions about The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints^Common Questions View More...Do I need to be baptized?...Do I need to be baptized ...Yes Jesus made it clear that baptism is necessary to enter the kingdom of heaven teaching we must be born of water and of the spirit Jesus Himself was baptizedeven though He was perfectto set an example for us ...Do I need to be baptized again if I was already baptized in a different church ...Yes Many who have beenbaptized in another church took that step in good faith with a sincere desire to accept and follow Jesus Christ We believe that when it comes to sacred ordinances or acts that are essential for our ^2^Common Questions View More ^Do I need to be baptized?

719158963401056753^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/jesus-knows-you?lang=eng^Jesus Christ Understands Your Challenges^No one has to go through life s challenges alone. Jesus Christ understands perfectly what you re going through and will support you....When Jesus suffered for all of us in the Garden of Gethsemane and on the cross He gained a perfect understanding of every trial we face. He knows what you are feeling and what you are going through and His grace will provide the strength you need to overcome it....When Jesus suffered for all of us in the Garden of Gethsemane and on the cross He gained a perfect understanding of every trial we face He knows what you are feeling and what you are going through and^2^No one has to go through life s challenges alone. Jesus Christ understands perfectly what you re going through and will support you.^When Jesus suffered for all of us in the Garden of Gethsemane and on the cross He gained a perfect understanding of every trial we face. He knows what you are feeling and what you are going through and His grace will provide the strength you need to overcome it.

719158964438460389^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/find-a-church?lang=eng^Find a Church The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints^Come find peace and strength as you worship with us at The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Find a church near you....Do I have to participate?...Do I have to participate ...Visitors are welcome to participate but they are not required to When the bread and water of the sacrament similar to Communion are distributed to the congregation if you dont feel comfortable participating simply pass the tray to the next person Other than that feel free to sit back and just enjoy the service ...Can I participate if Im not a member ...Yes You are invited to join us for weekly activities social^2^Come find peace and strength as you worship with us at The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Find a church near you. ^Do I have to participate?

719158962997135268^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/life-has-purpose?lang=eng^Find Meaning in Your Life -homepage^Your Life Has Purpose and Meaning...Life on earth didn t happen by accident. You are here as part of God s plan of happiness for all of us....Life on earth didn t happen by accident You are here as part of God s plan of happiness for all of us ...Have you ever wondered why you re here Why God created this earth and placed you on it If you feel deep in your soul that there must be some greater purpose to your life than simply existing you can find answers by turning to God ...We believe that we existed before this earth began living with God as His children in spirit form Like a parent sending ^2^Your Life Has Purpose and Meaning ^Life on earth didn t happen by accident. You are here as part of God s plan of happiness for all of us.

719158963914175829^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/bible-book-of-mormon-word-of-god?lang=eng^The Book of Mormon and the Bible are God s Word -Basic Beliefs^The Book of Mormon and the Bible are God s Word...The Book of Mormon and the Bible teach us about God s plan and testify of Jesus Christ....The Book of Mormon and the Bible teach us about God s plan and testify of Jesus Christ ...In the New Testament the Apostle Paul taught In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established 2 Corinthians 13 1 Members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter day Saints cherish the Bible as one of those witnesses and the Book of Mormon as another witness of Jesus Christ ...Like the Bible the Book of Mormon is a divinely inspired record compile^2^The Book of Mormon and the Bible are God s Word ^The Book of Mormon and the Bible teach us about God s plan and testify of Jesus Christ.

column1: 719158963186249160^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/savior-jesus-christ?lang=eng^Learn about Jesus Christ -Basic Beliefs^Jesus Christ is Your Savior...Jesus Christ is the Son of God your Savior and Redeemer sent to save us all. Because of Him you can find joy in knowing you can live with God and your loved ones for eternity....Jesus Christ is the Son of God your Savior and Redeemer sent to save us all Because of Him you can find joy in knowing you can live with God and your loved ones for eternity ...When God sent us here to earth to learn and grow He knew we would make mistakes So He sent us a Savior Jesus Christ to provide a way for us to repent and to be saved from physical death ...We believe in the divinity^2^Jesus Christ is Your Savior ^Jesus Christ is the Son of God your Savior and Redeemer sent to save us all. Strengthening your relationship with God can lead to stronger relationships with your family.

column1: 719158962211436752^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/what-to-expect?lang=eng^What to expect at Church -homepage^What to Expect at Church...Our Church is a place where you can come together with other believers to reflect worship learn and become a better person....Our Church is a place where you can come together with other believers to reflect worship learn and become a better person ...It says Visitors Welcome on all our buildings and we mean it Whether you re interested in becoming a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter day Saints visiting with a friend or just exercising a little curiosity we re happy to see you ...Church is a place of community and learning but most importantly it s a pla^2^What to Expect at Church ^Our Church is a place where you can come together with other believers to reflect worship learn and become a better person.

719158962362913444^https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/welcome/temples-bind-us?lang=eng^Temples Bind Us to God and Each Other^Temples Bind Us to God and Each Other...Because of the sacrifice of Jesus Christ and the promises we make when we choose to follow Him we can look forward to living with our loved ones and with God again after this life....Because of the sacrifice of Jesus Christ and the promises we make when we choose to follow Him we can look forward to living with our loved ones and with God again after this life ...At important times in our lives we can strengthen our relationship with God and receive special blessings from Him through covenants A covenant is a sacred promise between God and His children h^2^Temples Bind Us to God and Each Other ^Because of the sacrifice of Jesus Christ and the promises we make when we choose to follow Him we can look forward to living with our loved ones and with God again after this life.
